# satpoint

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of satpoint is to allows users to automatically extract data from an nc file for a specific location(s). 

## Installation

You can install the development version of satpoint from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("decide-project-eu/satpoint")
```
